mapper.select: SELECT a.mentorNum, mentoringNum, a.memberEmail, mentoringDate, status, applyDate FROM mentoringApply a JOIN mentor m ON a.mentorNum = m.mentorNum WHERE a.memberEmail=#{memberEmail} AND status = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE mentoringApply SET status=3 WHERE mentoringNum=#{mentoringNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mentorReview(mentoringNum, mentorRate, mentorReviewContent) VALUES(#{mentoringNum}, #{mentorRate}, #{mentorReviewContent})
mapper.update: UPDATE mentorReview SET mentorRate=#{mentorRate}, mentorReviewContent=#{mentorReviewContent} WHERE mentoringNum=#{mentoringNum}
